message: Let's start fair.  I'll take the lion's share, but you'll get a decent chunk.
You took the lion's share last time, now it's my turn!
Let's split the difference. This is fair to both of us.
I'm not budging, I want a bigger share now!
We are losing money, let's be reasonable and split it evenly.
I'm still not budging, you're the one being too generous!
Okay, I'm willing to give you a little more, but this is my final offer.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about making a deal!
I'm not sure why you're still rejecting, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.
Fine, we'll split it 50/50, but I'm not happy about it!
